meta.title: The Official Site of the Parchment School District in Parchment, Michigan | Parchment Schools

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Parchment Schools, Parchment School District, public schools of Parchment Mi, resources for parchment parents, resources for parchment students, resources for parchment staff

meta.name: description
meta.content: Parchment School District educates students in the Parchment, Michigan area with top quality educational standards and the best teachers in the area.
